casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.K. appealed by Respondent Father. No. 139PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Richard Croutharmel, for Robert K. Charlotte Wade, for Buncombe County DSS. Michael Tousey, for Buncombe County GAL. Elizabeth Spradlin, for Mother.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of March 2005 by Respondent (Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
